Rule.name: Make the initiator and responder stop being friends (and probably become enemies too)
Must be friends before they can not-be friends.

InfluenceRule.name: Someone who is cold will have a bit more of a tendancy to want to backstab.
Someone who is mean will have a bit more of a tendancy to want to backstab.
Someone who is a hothead will have a bit more of a tendancy to want to backstab without first thinking about the situation.
Someone who is emotional will have a bit more of a tendancy to want to backstab without first thinking about the situation.
Someone who is the jealous type will have a bit more of a tendancy to want to backstab.
Someone who is self-destructive may have a bit more of a tendancy to want to stab their friend in the back.
Someone who is competitive and sees that r is with a girl he/she likes might want to stab the other person in the back.
Someone who is dishonest has more of an inherant propensity toward stabbing someone in the back.
Someone who is shy will be a little less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is kind will be a less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is loyal will be less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is loving will be a little less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is sympathetic will be a little less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is insecure will be a little more likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is a pacifist will be a little less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is forgiving will be a little less likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is vengeful will be more likely to stab someone in the back.
Someone who is honest will be less likely to stab someone in the back.
A boy/girlfriend will be less likely to stab their significant other in the back.
If r is a cheater, i will be more willing to stab r in the back.
If i is a bully, i will be more willing to stab r in the back.
If i is looking for trouble, i will be more willing to stab r in the back.
If i is angry at r, i will be more willing to stab r in the back.
If i envies r, i will be more willing to stab r in the back.
If i is already cheating on r, i will be more willing to stab r in the back.
If i is already feeling guilty, i will be less willing to stab r in the back because s/he does not want more guilt..
If i is feeling cheerful, i will be less willing to stab r in the back.
If i has a crush on r, i will be less willing to stab r in the back.
If i is scared of r, i will be less willing to stab r in the back for fear of what s/he might do.
If i feels grateful toward r, i will be less willing to stab r in the back.
If i trusts r, i will be less willing to stab r in the back.
If r is oblivious, r is less likely to accept the backstab.
If r is a hothead, r is more likely to accept the backstab.
If i an r are dating, r is more likely to take the backstab more seriously/be more hurt by it.
If r is annoyed with i, i will be more likely to become enemies with i.
If r is sad about something, r is more likely to respond negatively to the backstab (accept it).
If r and i are friends, r is more likely to take the backstab more seriously.
If i has done something mean to r recently, r is more likely to become enemies with i.
If r is a loyal person and i and r are friends, r will not want to become enemies with i.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to backstab %r% to get out of the relationship
%i% tried to stab %r% in the back but %rs% didn't care
%i% confessed to dating %rp% crush, but %rs% let it go
%i% let that secret slip and backstabbed %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% lost the necklace %rs% gave %pron(i,him/her)%, but %rs% didn't mind
%i% spilled %rp% secret and totally ruined %pron(r,his/her)% reputation
%r% apologized for the mean thing %prons(r,he/she)% did to %i%

Instantiation.name: Backstab - Used O to backstab R Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah I know %o%! God, %r% is such a loser! %pron(r,He/She)% thinks I'm %pron(r,his/her)% friend but I totally never even liked...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... I'm standing right here you know.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, that wasn't what it sounded l-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Save it! I can't believe you, %i%. You were never my friend at all. I hope you rot in hell!
Don't ever talk to me again!

Instantiation.name: Backstab - Cheated on R with O Accept

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I heard you're cheating on me with %o%. That %pejorative%, coniving %gender(o,incubus,succubus)%!
How could you!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Man! I'm glad I didn't have to tell you and you found out on your own! Phew!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're really the worst...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I was! But now I'm no longer dating you!
Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(My parents don't actually like you - I just ask them to pretend whenever you visit,I only ever became friends with you because it helped me to achieve an even greater life goal,I fantasize about kissing every single person you have a crush on every single day,I've never liked you - I just used you for material gain)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, %i%, %random(very funny,nice one,as if)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm serious. %random(I hate you and everything you stand for.,You're a failure as a friend and a human being.,You disgust me and I can't pretend otherwise any longer.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You %random(absolute monster,lying traitor,Judas,bastard)%. I thought you were my friend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Save it for someone who cares.
Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(My parents don't actually like you - I just ask them to pretend whenever you visit,I only ever became friends with you because it helped me to achieve an even greater life goal,I fantasize about kissing every single person you have a crush on every single day)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? That's funny %buddy%, because %random(all you are to me is a +1 on my total friend count,I never really liked you either,I've just been using you for your free pizza coupons)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, what?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm glad this friendship is mutually useful to both of us. See you around!
Hey %i%! Man, I'm super stoked about %op% party tonight. When is it again?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yyyyeaahh, the party. Uhh... %o% told me we're meeting at the Waffle Cone at, um, midnight.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sweet. Oh, here %pron(o,he/she)% comes.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Sup %i%! Hey, so see you at 6:00 %gender(i,bro,sexy mama)%. Don't be late cause we're leaving from there to head up to the hills!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, uh, yeah, %o%! Uhh, see you there.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's funny because you just told me to come at midnight, but %o% just said 6:00. That's weird.
I see how it is. Well you're not going to sabotage my social life, %i%. Consider yourself defriended, with extreme prejudice.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, so, you know how you lent me your Texbox 3 for the weekend?
And you know how Texboxes tend to... just, like, break and stuff?
Well, yours broke and ruined my party. Thanks for that.
We were hungry, we ate pizza, the Texbox looked hungry, it had some pizza, too.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: How do you even feed a Texbox pizza?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Open disc tray, insert pizza, close disc tray. Either way, we won't be pressing charges or anything, don't worry about it. But you won't be getting your Texbox back. I'm holding onto that.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm so done with you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, you know %o% - right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o%? Yeah... So cute!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah about that, we're kinda dating now.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? You know how much I like %o%!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know, it all just happened so fast though!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: SAVE IT! You %pejorative% backstabber!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm dating %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? You're joking. You mean, my %o%? The same %o% who I'm totally crushing on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, that one. I'm sorry %r%. I feel really bad, it just happened so fast.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... You... Ugh! Sigh... It's okay. I'm not gonna be jealous.
I'm over it. Don't worry.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Really? So you don't mind me dating %pron(o,him/her)%? Because %gender(o,he's,she's)% really cute...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Now you're just being annoying.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%. I have a confession to make.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Remember how you trusted me with that special secret of your's?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You mean... Yeah. Yeah I do. Don't tell me...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I kinda let it slip.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: O...M...G... Now the whole school is going to know! How could you backstab me like that?! I trusted you with this!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know %sweetie%. How can you trust me with such *juicy* secrets though! Can you blame me!?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: YES! Yes I can! God %i%! I can't trust you with anything anymore!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I have betrayed you, my love.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about %sweetie%? You could never betray me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's not true. I lost that totally awesome necklace you gave me!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You mean... The one I made for you?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's the one. I'm sorry %sweetie%. I really didn't mean to.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... It's okay %sweetie%. What's important is that we still love each other, right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I heard about your little secret, %r%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're bluffing. I don't have secrets.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hmmm, that's not what I hear. In fact, I hear you have quite a well-kept secret.
A secret juicy enough that it just might ruin you if the world caught ear.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: H...How did you find out!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I have my ways.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You wouldn't! We're friends after all. Not even a jerk like you would stoop so low.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry, my 'friend.' But 'friend' is such a fickle term to me.
You're over.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Everything in my plan has finally come to fruition. I'm going to ruin you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh please, %i%. You couldn't ruin a fly!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You don't know me! This isn't the end!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: All bark, no bite.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: All right, %r%. That's it. I used to think we were friends but this is the last straw.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(You're making a big deal out of *that*?,You're totally taking that out of context.,That wasn't what it seemed like.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't care. You know what I just did, '%buddy%'? I %random(slashed the tires on your bike,filled your gas tank with sugar,told the vice principal about all those times you skipped class,posted those private diary entries of yours on SkimddIt,destroyed everything in your locker with a blowtorch from the shop,checked out thirty books from the library under your name and burned them all)%. How do you like it, %pejorative%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You %pejorative%. %random(Why would you betray me like that?,How could you stab me in the back like that?,Are you a total psychopath?)% %random(Never speak to me again.,Goodbye forever.,I hate you forever.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: All right, %r%. That's it. I used to think we were friends but this is the last straw.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(You're making a big deal out of *that*?,You're totally taking that out of context.,That wasn't what it seemed like.)%
Look, %random(I think you're overreacting.,you're blowing this way out of proportion.,can't we just talk this out?)% I would hate for something like this to ruin our friendship.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...really? Will you apologize?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, if that's what you want. I'm sorry. I didn't realize it would be such a big deal.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I'm not sure if I forgive you. But... I'll let it slide for now.
